title: Marquess
description: Lord Coverdale was a stern, forbidding man, hardly a person who would welcome being guardian of several high-spirited children. Isabel was concerned that the Earl of Rutleigh's unfortunate second marriage, had made him go off the rails- how else could he have made such an unfortunate will? Furthermore, he had never advised Lord Coverdale of his intentions- so the news of his guardianship came as even more of a surprise to that city gentleman, than it did to the children.But Lord Coverdale was a man of immense wealth and power. He did not imagine that a situation would come about which he could not control. He therefore embarked on his duties with no qualms- he had not, however, met Isabel...
author: Mary Ann Gibbs
